author: higginsloria
description: Betsy DeVos, the U.S. Secretary of Education, was grilled about the federal education budget proposal during a Congressional hearing today
title: Education Secretary Betsy DeVos takes heat over voucher discrimination question

description: The International Baccalaureate (IB) develops and sustains a worldwide community of students, educators and schools, with a shared mission to offer the best possible international education combined
title: If you’re seeking the best education for your children, look for an IB Accredited School

description: The education secretary testified before a House subcommittee on the Trump administration's 2018 budget proposal, which calls for deep cuts to education.
title: Here's What Betsy DeVos Said Wednesday On Capitol Hill

author: Kate Abbey-Lambertz
description: The education secretary accuses critics of hindering innovation, then calls Trump's budget, which would cut education 13 percent, a "historic investment"...
title: Betsy DeVos Compares School Choice Critics To ‘Flat-Earthers’

author: Lily Martis
description: The fastest-growing jobs hiring now include STEM, medical, manufacturing, and education.
title: The Fastest-Growing Jobs in Each State

author: Emma Kate Fittes
description: U.S. Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos — addressing the American Federation for Children in Indianapolis — spoke adamantly about how public education shouldn't be run from Washington, D.C.
title: DeVos: School choice should expand, but not from Washington D.C.

description: The policy analyst argues school reform has brought public education to the brink of destruction. $9.2 billion—that's the amount the Trump administration plans to slice from the Department of Education, according to its latest budget proposal.
title: Diane Ravitch: Betsy DeVos Is a Monster the Democrats Helped Create

description: We're the engineers behind Khan Academy. We're building a free, world-class education for anyone, anywhere.
title: Memcached-Backed Content Infrastructure at Khan Academy

author: Emma Brown, Emma Brown
description: Testifying before Congress on Wednesday, the education secretary repeatedly emphasized a return to more local control over schools.
title: DeVos won’t say whether she’d withhold federal funds from private schools that discriminate

author: Jennifer Bendery
description: Trump's education secretary apparently sees no problem with giving federal money to schools that reject queer kids.
title: Betsy DeVos: If States Discriminate Against LGBTQ Students, It's Cool By Me
